title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
OB:
1. Open the Control Example
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash
EB: The flashing should be reduced or eliminated when resizing the window
SR: Investigate the cause of the flashing and find a solution to reduce or eliminate it
